Get details of a specific project by ID.

Authorization required: Customer token (must be the owner of the project)

request.description:
Update an existing project.

Authorization required: Customer token (must be the owner of the project)

request.description:
Delete a project. Can only be done if there are no active jobs associated with the project.

Authorization required: Customer token (must be the owner of the project)

response.name: Project Has Active Jobs

request.description:
Get all jobs belonging to a specific project.

Authorization required: Customer token (must be the owner of the project)
